inn1.comm: too wide, pitched well wide of the off stump and swinging away further
back of a length on the middle stump, gets on the back foot and works it away towards square leg for a single
short and wide, there to cut, Udawatte tries to do just that, misses, will be disappointed not to have dispatched that
good length on the off stump and swinging away just a touch, defended back to the bowler
full outside off, beaten this time, Udawatte goes for an expansive drive, misses
good length on middle and leg, turned away to fine leg
full on the pads, flicked away to square leg, where a misfield allows them a single
short of a good length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
short and wide, there to hit, tries to cut, misses
poor ball, short of a good length on leg stump, walks across and glances that to the fine leg boundary
short and wide, tries to cut, gets a thick edge towards gully
wide down the leg side
back of a length on middle and off, defended off the back foot
down the leg side once again, struggling with his line here
and again, keeps drifting down leg
short on middle, gets on the back foot and tries to pull it over square leg, gets a top edge that just evades the square leg fielder, scramble a single
another wide, well outside off stump this time
beaten! that was bowled on a good length on the off stump and swinging away just as Tharanga prods at it, good comeback
short of a good length outside off, keeps low, Tharanga gets his bat down in time
back of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot towards cover
beaten! bowled on a good length outside off, holding its line this time, Tharanga tries to defend, staying his ground, misses, and gets to the keeper at a good height
short of a good length outside off, pushed firmly off the back foot to cover
short of a good length outside off, gets on the back foot and chops it down to cover
short outside off, left alone, no swing on that one
good length outside off, punched off the back foot to cover
back of a length on the off stump, pushed off the back foot to the bowler

gone! bowled on a good length on middle and off, Udawatte gets forward and tries to defend it back to the bowler, is struck a little high on the pads, definitely in line, and the umpire raises his finger. Zimbabwe strike early
back of a length outside off, he's standing well outside his crease, drops it onto the off side for a quick single
shot! short of a good length outside off, no foot movement from the batsman there, stands his ground but just punches it firmly between cover and cover-point for three runs
good length outside off, drives at it lazily without any foot movement, misses
short of a good length outside off, pushed straight to cover
beaten! that was bowled on a good length outside off, Tharanga comes forward to defend, the ball swings away at just the last moment to escape the outside edge
good length on middle and off, defended watchfully back to the bowler
short of a good length outside off, pushed wide of mid off for a quick single
full outside off, driven straight to cover
good length on the off stump, worked away straight to square leg
back of a length on the off stump, driven back to the bowler
full outside off, driven firmly but Sibanda at short extra-cover dives to his left to pull off a brilliant save
short of a good length outside off, chopped down to cover
short and wide, cuts it fiercely but Chibhabha at backward point dives full length to his right to save a couple of runs
full on middle and leg, pushed to long on for a single
back of a length on middle, dropped onto the leg side for a quick single
full outside off, driven uppishly towards deep cover
beaten! pitching on a good length on off and singing away after pitching, Sangakkara tried to prod at it but was done in by the swing
full on the pads, tries to flick it away fine, gets a leg bye towards square leg instead
short of a good length on middle, worked away wide of mid on for a single
bouncer on middle, Sangakkara ducks
fuller on middle and off, angling in a touch, driven back to the bowler
short of a good length on middle and leg, whipped away straight to mid wicket
full outside off, driven to a deepish mid off for a quick single
full on middle and off, pushed wide of mid on for another single
full outside off, takes it on the half-volley and drives it powerfully wide of mid off for a welcome boundary
another one! full on middle and leg, makes a little room and drives it down the ground, wide of the bowler and a diving mid on for another four
back of a length on the off stump, dropped onto the off side for a quick single
short on middle, deserves to be hit, Sangakkara rocks onto the back foot and pulls it to the deep mid wicket boundary. Sri Lanka getting a move-on now
short and wide, cut away wide of a diving point, towards third man for two runs
gone! that was short of a good length on the off and moving away, Tharanga tries to defend it off the back foot, gets the thinnest of edges to Taibu who takes a comfortable catch
good length ball outside off and swinging away, left alone
good length on the off stump, pushed to cover
short and wide, cut away to point, didn't find the gap there
tossed up on middle and leg, worked away wide of short fine leg for a couple
much flatter outside off, dropped onto the off side for a single
short and wide outside off, cut away wide of point for a couple
tossed up, pitches on a good length on the off stump and spinning in, gets outside the line to flick it away towards square leg, misses
flighted on middle and leg, turned away towards short fine leg
short on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler. Sangakkara could have hit that anywhere, will be disappointed about missing out there
full on middle and leg, flicked wide of square leg for a single
wide down the leg side, pitching short of a good length outside leg and swinging further down
good length outside off, opens the face to guide it to third man for a single

gone! poor shot! that was short and wide, held its line, Jayawardene reached for it, tried to slash it wide of point, got a thick outside edge and Taibu moved well to his right to take a good catch. Zimbabwe are doing well here!
full on the pads, driven straight to mid wicket
short of a length outside off, swinging in after pitching, left alone
spoils it! wide down the leg side, gifting easy runs
good length outside off, holding its line, left alone.
tossed up on middle, driven on the front foot towards long on
flatter, pitching on a good length on off and spinning into the right hander, gets on the front foot and pushes it to long on
flighted on middle and leg, pushed to mid wicket
gave it some more air this time, pitches on a good length on the off, defended
flighted, held it back this time, comes down the track and plays it straight to mid wicket
similar ball but Sangakkara is able to push it wide of mid wicket for a single this time
short of a good length on leg stump, whipped away off his hips to fine leg
short of a good length outside off, chopped down to cover. Not timing the ball well here, the Sri Lankans
short of a length outside off, kept low, Kapugedara tried to drive it on the up towards cover, but failed to connect
shot! poor ball! full on leg stump, Kapugedara drives it uppishly wide of mid wicket with a flick of the wrists for a boundary
full on the pads again, flicked away much squarer this time, fine leg runs to his left to keep the batsmen to a couple
bowled full outside off, watches it to the keeper
bowled full on middle and leg, dropped onto the leg side for a quick single
flighted on middle and off, pitches short of a good length, comes down the track and pushes it straight to mid wicket
flighted, pitches short outside off, comes down the track and cuts it away to deep point for a single
flat, short outside off from round the wicket to the left hander, cut straight to point
flighted, pitches on a good length, Sangakkara comes down the track and drives that straight to short extra cover
flatter, and much quicker through the air, pushed straight to cover. End of an excellent over
flighted on middle and leg, pitches short of a good length, pushed to long on for a single
tossed up outside off, sweeps it towards deep mid wicket
flatter through the air, pitches on a good length on middle, defended watchfully
flighted on middle and off from well wide of the wicket, defended yet again
bowled flat on middle and spinning away towards off, pushed back to the bowler
and again, flat on middle and off, played back to the bowler

dropped, that was bowled flat on middle and off, pitches on a good length, Sangakkara comes down the track and pushes it firmly straight to Utseya who fails to hold on, the ball rolls over towards long on and the batsmen take a single
short outside off, plays a delicate late cut wide of short third man for a single
short outside off, pushed off the back foot to long on
short on the off stump, pulled away straight to mid wicket

dropped, that was flighted on middle and off, Kapugedara comes down the track and lofts it towards long on, where Masakadza takes a few steps back to take the catch above his head, fails to hold on and the ball lobs off his fingers and over the boundary ropes
short outside off, cut wide of short third man for a single
pushed to mud wicket
played back to the bowler
tossed up, comes down the track and tries to loft it over the bowlers head, gets an inside edge onto his pads
shorter this time, played to mid wicket
fuller, pushed back to the bowler. This is superb bowling
short of a good length on middle and leg, defended
oversteps, bowled short outside off, played to short cover
another no ball, the free hit stays, short outside off, swatted in the direction of long off
big one! that was in the zone, flighted on middle stump, pitches on a full length, Kapugedara gets under it, lofts it powerfully over the bowlers head for a big six
sensible batting, held it back this time, pushed to long on for a single
flatter outside off, Sangakkara pushes it uppishly between point and cover for a single
short and wide, cut away to point for a single
flighted on middle, Sangakkara came down the track to deposit that one into the stands over long on, gets an inside edge onto his pads, Utseya saw him coming down, held it back
pushed to long on for a single
hit straight to mid wicket
driven to long on for a single
short of a length on middle, punched off the back foot to long on
short of a length on the off, pushed firmly to long on
short and wide, much flatter, cut away to deep point

stumped, off a wide ball, bowled full outside leg stump, Taibu collects it well and removes the bails in no time to find Kapugedara outside the crease as he attempts to flick the ball towards square leg. Good job! That appeared as though it was planned
bowled full outside off, tries to push at it, misses
good length outside off, defended watchfully on the off side
full outside off, trying to tempt the batsman into the drive, Mubarak leaves it alone, given a wide
short of a good length on middle and off, Mubarak walks across and pushes that between mid on and mid wicket for a couple
short of a good length on the leg stump, driven to long on for a single
slower ball, misdirected, well wide of the off stump, given a wide
full outside off, Mubarak gets forward and drives it uppishly, on the bounce to mid on
good length outside off, driven on the up to deep cover. 100 up for Sri Lanka. They've been made to work for their runs here
flighted on the off stump, turned away to short fine leg
tossed up on middle and leg, flicked away wide of short-fine for a well run two
flighted on the off stump, Sangakkara comes down the track and chips that one in the direction of deep mid wicket for a single
short outside off, tries to cut, misses
flighted, pitches full outside off, tries to drive, gets a thick outside edge towards short third man for a single
flighted on middle and off, driven to long on for a single
short on middle and leg, pulled away towards deep square leg
short of a length on middle, swept powerfully towards deep mid wicket
short of a good length pitching on off and spinning away, Sangakkara tries to push that firmly towards cover, misses
short of a good length on leg stump, comes down the track and works it away between deep square leg and long on for a couple
flighted outside leg stump, swept away uppishly over short fine leg for a one bounce four
another one! flatter outside off, sweeps it firmly wide of short fine and away from the deep square leg fielder for successive boundaries
short outside off, played wide of point for a single
short of a good length outside off, tries to late-cut it towards short third, misses
shot! that flighted on the off stump, comes down the track, strikes it over the bowlers head, and bisects the gap between long off and long on for another important boundary
flighted outside off, swept away to deep mid wicket
tossed up outside off, fetches it from outside off to  sweep it down to fine leg
swept in front of square this time, flat outside off, plays it between deep square leg and deep mid wicket for a couple
full outside off, driven straight to deep cover
full outside off, pushed wide of cover for a single
full outside off, driven down the ground to long off for a single
full on middle and off, driven towards deep mid wicket for a single. Calls for a second but is sent back by Mubarak, gets back into the crease at the non strikers end just in time
full outside off, driven uppishly to long off
back of a length outside off, chipped over the bowlers head towards long on for a single
flighted outside off, comes down the track and drags it towards deep square leg for a couple
good length outside off, swept in front of square towards deep mid wicket
tossed up on the off stump, driven to long on for a single
held it back, bowled flat outside off, lofted in the direction of long on for a single. Fifty for Sangakkara!
short outside off, tries to cut, bounces more than he expects, misses
short of a length on the off, swept to deep square leg for a couple
full on the off stump, driven to long off for a single
short and wide outside off, thinks of cutting it away, backs away, given a wide
full again on the off stump, driven back straight to the bowler
low full toss outside off, driven firmly to extra cover, who fumbles to allow the batsmen a single
good length on middle and off, lofted over mid on, didn't get hold of it but managed to clear mid on for a couple
wide again, full outside off and angling away, wisely left alone
full on middle and off, comes down the track and strikes that powerfully between long on and deep mid wicket for a boundary

full on the off stump, Sangakkara comes down and tries to loft that one over mid on, fails to connect well, gets the leading edge and Mupariwa at mid on runs backwards and dives to his left to take a superb catch
driven to sweeper cover for a couple
comes down the track, driven down the ground to long off
big one! that was a juicy full toss on middle and leg, swings it away over mid wicket for a massive six!
driven to mid wicket for a single this time
tries to work it away towards the leg side, deflects off the pads towards third man, two taken
swings and misses, 12 runs off that over
driven down the ground to long off
full outside off, slashed away towards third man for a boundary
driven down the ground to long on off the front foot
gone!! that was bowled full on middle, tries to drive it on the on-side, gets a leading edge to Raymond Price at backward point who takes a comfortable catch
poor ball, drifting onto the pads, Maharoof glances it down to the fine-leg boundary
gone! that was bowled full on middle and off, Maharoof drives that uppishly and straight to extra cover where Utseya completes an easy catch. Mupariwa finishes with four wickets!

inn2.comm: defended on the front foot
gets on the front foot, pushes it to mid wicket for a single.Zimbabwe off the mark
pitching outside off, swinging away, left alone
gets on the front foot and defends
gets a thick outside edge to third man as he tries to play it off the back foot, a single taken
good line, pitches on a good length on middle and off, defended watchfully
pitches outside off, gets on the back foot and driven wide of extra cover
good length on the stumps, defended
comes down the track and drives it over extra cover for three runs
pushed towards mid wicket for a single
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
short, pulled away wide of mid wicket for a single, didn't get hold of it though
full on the pads, glanced down to the fine leg boundary
big one! comes down the track and strikes it powerfully over mid wicket for a big six
good length outside off, swinging away, left alone
full on the leg stump and angling down, tries to push it to the on-side, misses, i struck on the pads, the fielders go up, but the umpire is not interested
defended on the front foot
pushed to extra cover off the back foot
tries to play ti on the on-side, misses, gets a legbye
defended off the back foot, no run there
good looking short off the back foot, pitched short of a good length outside off, played wide of extra cover for a couple
driven to mid on off the front foot for a quick single
short ball, there to hit, pulled away over mid wicket for another big one! Zimbabwe going along nicely here
slower ball, deceives the batsman, no run there
defended on the front foot
chipped uppishly towards long on for a couple
picks the slower one this time, bowled short, gets on the back foot and swings it away over the deep square leg boundary for yet another six.
on the front foot this time, driven wide of extra cover for a couple
pitched on leg and angling down, struck on the pads, no run
good length outside off, swinging away, left alone
slower ball pitching short of a good length outside off, guided to third man for a single
misdirected slower ball, bowled well outside off, rightly given a wide
pushed to extra cover on the front foot for a single
shot! short outside the off stump, picks the length up early, cut away off the back foot for a boundary
pushed to extra cover for a quick single. That's the fifty partnership! Good performance by the openers here
back of a length on middle and leg, glanced wide of short fine leg for a couple
defended on the front foot, sensible batting here
swept to fine leg
driven down the ground off the back foot towards long on
pitches on leg and drifting down, is struck on the pads, but would have missed the leg stump
pushed off the front foot wide of mid wicket for a single
defended on the front foot
They're playing Mendis cautiously here, watchfully defended
poor start, way outside the off stump, given a wide
Zimbabwe on the move here, that was short and wide, cut fiercely wide od backward point for a boundary
driven to long off on the front foot where Murali is a little late to get to the ball, allows the batsmen to take a couple
swing and a miss, lapse in concentration there
driven on the front foot down to long on for a couple more
quick single, pushed wide of extra cover and the batsmen set off
good length on middle and off, defended off the front foot
pitching on middle, strikes the pads as the batsman tries to play at it, the fielders go up but the appeal is turned down
drifting on the pads, no run though
pitches outside off, goes for a big sweep, misses
on the pads, no run. Good start by Murali here
charges down the track and hits it straight to cover
pitching on leg stump, worked away towards short fine leg for a single
pushed to mid on for a quick single
swinging into the right hander, rapped on the pads, an appeal for lbw but the umpire thinks it hit the bat, a run taken
short of a length, pulled back to the bowler
played back to the bowler once again, no run there
makes room and goes for a big heave, misses
slower ball on the off stump, played onto the off side, no run there
pitches on leg stump, worked away towards the on-side for a single
dropped onto the off side for another quick single
flicked away to short fine leg for a single
Murali continues to bowl on the pads, the batsmen scramble a leg bye
down the leg side, wide given
straighter this time, played back to the bowler
full toss on the off stump, pushed to cover for a single
good length on middle and off, defended
played off the back foot for a quick single towards mid on
pushed towards cover for another single. The two batsmen running well here

gone!! that was short outside off, Sibanda fishes for it and tries to play at it with hard hands, hardly any footwork, gets a thick outside edge to Sangakkara who makes no mistake. Sri Lanka strike, finally! What a spirited innings by Sibanda!
short outside off, hit hard to cover where a misfield allows them a single. Taibu off the mark
Taibu continues his sweeping spree against the spinners, that was pitched outside off, he reverse-sweeps it to the deep cover boundary
drifting on the pads, reverse swept to third man
pushed towards mid wicket for a single
reverse sweeps yet again, no run though
wide down the leg side, Murali feeling the heat here now
reverse swept once again, no run this time
same shot, same result, but he's managed to unsettle Murali here
pushed to long off for a single
driven back to the bowler, well fielded on the follow through by Thushara
cut away through the covers for a couple. Taibu's keeping the momentum here
slower ball bowled full on middle and leg, driven straight to mid wicket
cut away off the back foot towards cover once again, no run this time
slower ball outside off, mistimes a cut shot but it effects a single nevertheless
reverse swept wide of point for a single. This shot is now the norm against Murali
dropped onto the off side, no run
tries to work it away on the leg side, but is unable to pierce the field
driven down the ground towards long off for a single
plays the orthodox sweep this time, but unable to find the gap
swept for a single this time
reverse swept for a single but they take another one off the direct hit onto the stumps
reverse sweep again, big shout for lbw turned down, take a single anyway
dropped onto the off side for a single
slower ball outside off, tries to play at it, misses, and goes through to the keeper
guided to third man for a single
takes a quick single, excellent fifty by Masakadza
driven to mid off for a single
yorker length, dug out,  no run there

struck firmly back past the bowler and into the stumps at the non strikers end, the ball ricochets off the stumps towards mid wicket, a single taken.

100 up for Zimbabwe
cut towards cover for a single
reverse swept once again for a single
quicker ball, dropped onto the off side
short ball outside off, sliced away for a couple
straighter, driven down the ground for a single
reverse swept to third man for a single
good length on the pads, flicked away for a single
Sangakkara standing up, slower ball bowled outside off, looks to play at it, misses
slower ball outside off, swung away to the deep square leg boundary. What a shot!
driven hard on the off side for a single
keeper standing back now, short of a length, flies off the pitch to the keeper
dropped onto the off side, no run, good comeback from Maharoof
driven on the off side for a quick single
swept behind square for a single
tries to sweep again, gets the leading edge that falls safe, no run
shot! swept away from well outside the off stump to the deep mid wicket boundary
straighter and fuller, defended
driven wide of long on for a couple
reverse swept to sweeper cover for a single
ball straightens and hits on the pads, big appeal, turned down
looking to go downtown, big swing and a miss
pitches on the pads again, looks to work it away, no run
pitches on the off, pushed through the covers for a single
reverse swept again to the sweeper on the off side for a single
cut away for a single to deep point
shot! short and wide, makes room and strikes that powerfully to the deep extra cover boundary
pushed to mid on for a single, 50 partnership comes up! Masakadza is playing a blinder here
full toss on middle, hit wide of mid wicket for a single
shot! struck hard down the pitch, almost taking off the umpire, for a boundary between long off and long on. Zimbabwe inching closer now!

gone!! goes for another big one, gets a thick outside edge that flies away towards third man where Kulasekara takes a well judged catch. Sri Lanka have struck, but is it too late? Masakadza departs for a potentially decisive 77
cut away  for a single
dropped on the off side for a quick single once again
hit hard into the ground, bounces over the cover fielder, another single
another single taken towards cover
comes down the track and plays it towards mid on for a single
pushed firmly wide of mid on for a couple
bowled im!! comes down the track and tries to flay a quicker one, misses completely, and the off stump is out of the ground. What a timely wicket!
defended watchfully
swept to mid wicket for a single
shot! driven wide of deep extra cover on the front foot for three runs
slower ball outside off, big swing, missed
worked away off the back foot towards short fine leg for a single
driven down the ground, a misfield allows them two runs. Zimbabwe on the verge of pulling off a miracle here
full toss, played towards mid wicket for a single
gone!! slower ball bowled full on middle, tries to swing it away towards mid wicket, misses, and the stumps take a beating
good length on middle, slog-swept over deep mid wicket for a flat six
short outside off, cut away for a boundary. Is this over now!!
played down the ground for a quick single
spun in, played down, no run
bowled im!! Chibhabha went for a big sweep, missed it completely, and the ball crashed into middle and off stump
tries to sweep Mendis off his first ball, misses, and Sangakkara collects well, no run
gone!! he was struck in line with middle stump, no doubts there, the umpire raises his finger and there is dead silence around the ground
tries to sweep, gets a leg bye to short fine leg
reverse swept to backward point for a single
swing and miss, legbye taken towards short extra cover
tucked off the pads towards the leg side for a single

gone!! so near, yet so far! charges down the track but misses a straight ball, Sangakkara fumbles it the first time but recovers well to take down the stumps. It's referred to the third umpire and the batsman is short of his ground.  Sri Lanka have won a thriller, by just five runs!
